title: My ADC is a feeding auto-filled support main. Why do they lose 4 LP, while I lose 16 LP?
body:
Serious question, is this system supposed to make any sense?

I'm quite literally losing games to auto-filled, or even off-role, players feeding, while they give zero fucks because their main role isn't being penalized. There's no incentive to treat their off-role games as anything but throw aways, because the LP loss is so minimal.

This is beyond stupid and whoever designed this should be held accountable for it. It's pretty disgusting to imagine all of the things this design and development time could have been spent on that would have actually improved the quality of the game, instead of this abortion that disincentivizes trying if you get anything but your main role.
